title: Mannequin
abstract: The mannequin at a department store comes to life as the night falls. Her midsummer’s night dream is composed on a flatbed Steenbeck. The 35mm negative print found footage lends a rather ghosty look.
credits: Concept and Realisation by Trang Nguyen
Found Footage from “Meine Frau macht Musik” – Hans Heinrich, 1958
